name: Space Crusaders 2
description:
This is an updated version of Space Crusaders (the first game that I created independently) with a bit of a twist on the movement scheme. Ultimately, it's just an arcade shooter. Shoot aliens until one of them reaches the bottom of the screen or you die.

I own everything in this game, from the bottom up! Code, music, sfx, graphics and all.

Fun features: flexible text box generator featuring text skip, collisions, special attack, juice.

Controls: W, A, S, and D to move. Left mouse button to shoot. Right mouse button to special attack.
